title: Taste of Love
overview: The drama is adapted from the manhua "Blackmailed By Bossy CEO" (我被总裁黑上了) by Yuan Chang You Jia which talks about a misunderstanding surrounding popular female idol Tang Su, causing her to disappear from the surface of the entertainment industry. After she gained a crazy 25kg, she had to become the Entertainment company CEO Huangfu Jue's personally nanny through a series of accidents. What she didn't expect was that Huangfu Jue who is face blind is Tang Su's number 1 anti-fan! The two launch into a hilarious and thrilling incidents where love ultimately blooms.
